entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
